description: Used to indicate a location where something is happening or someone is located.

example.fi: Missä hän istuu? Hän istuu työpöydällään kotitoimistossa.
example.en: Where is he/she sitting? He/She is sitting at his/her desk in the home office.

description: Denotes the origin of movement or the starting point of an action.

example.en: Where do you come from? I come from Finland.

description: Indicates the direction or the endpoint of movement.

example.en: Where are you going? I am going to the store.
